description:
Goku and Jiren are at the end of their ropes as the clock winds down! Will the 7th Universe finally emerge victorious?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiseki no Kecchaku! Saraba Gokuu! Mata Au Hi made!!
The Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until We Meet Again!!
¡Un final milagroso! ¡Adiós, Goku! Hasta que nos volvamos a encontrar
奇跡の決着! さらば悟空! また会う日まで!!
